title: Riot, you've created a monster
body: My mother saw Poppy's new splash and demands that you flood your store with Poppy merch so she can buy it all.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Tebarn,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pUn4uw8u,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-26T20:01:39.716+0000)
>
> I'll definitively buy Poppy Merch. 
> 
> Now, where is Urgot figure?... What, it will never come?...
> 
> {{champion:6}} {{item:3070}}

I'd love it if any Urgot figure was more of a do-it-yourself sort of thing.  Some assembly required, etc.  :)

*half assed assembled*
{{champion:6}} Existence is torment...

In that case, there musn't be any glue or magnets to hold the pieces together, you just gotta tape them together with bubblegum, spit, and prayer, and hope to god that it doesn't collapse on itself to maintain fidelity to the character.

Seriously, I hope to god that they keep his "death" idle animation on his relaunch, that little animation of him slumping over dead before getting shocked back to life just sums up his entire character in a few motions.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pUn4uw8u,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-26T21:30:34.052+0000)
>
> I'd love it if any Urgot figure was more of a do-it-yourself sort of thing.  Some assembly required, etc.  :)

http://cdn.hobbylink.tv/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/rrobbert184-tachikoma-unbox-23.jpg

now just gotta make it a bit more green and gray.
Shit now I want one of those too
instead of legos, you guys sell leagos. _HYEE HYEE HYEE!_

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pUn4uw8u,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-26T21:30:34.052+0000)
>
> I'd love it if any Urgot figure was more of a do-it-yourself sort of thing.  Some assembly required, etc.  :)

I'd love a cute little Yorick figure with a smiling skull shovel, but that ain't happening either.  Not until the reworks are done and Riot get over their collective hatred of these champs.
Rek'Sai Pls
Just give her some Tristana merch. She won't notice the difference. *Puts on shades and slides away all edgy like*
**My** mom started crying when i tried to swap out the Poppy merch for Teemo merch...
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/c73a4af9d90c4ad2c49283baaa743175.jpg
this needs to be a tribute post all on it's own.
Just wait until you tell her about swans
not sure if real or if OP is just creating a cover story for him to buy the merch and not feel embarrassed about it...

I have a collection of stuffed animals. One of them is Archimedes. One of them is Vinyl Scratch. One of them is Lulu. I have no qualms telling people I have those. I like Poppy, but not enough to buy stuff for her.
I'd love to get my hands on Archimedes (or better yet, a spycrab). I also need to save up for a Zecora and a Trixie...
Yeah, 'cause saying your mom wanted it is totally not embarrassing /kappa
_**Fear the merch-hungry  Momthers**_
I feel like it's only on League Boards that I am totally okay with click-bait titles.  In fact, they usually humor me-- Seeing some potentially-raging post, only for it to be something silly.
Then she will see the prices and laugh her ass off
Oh god my wallet would cry... *owns every poppy skin*
lmao
I want my Karthus Merch first!

> [{quoted}](name=Menea Calais,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pUn4uw8u,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-26T18:32:33.289+0000)
>
> My mother saw Poppy's new splash and demands that you flood your store with Poppy merch so she can buy it all.

So it begins.
